means: 麦纳麦（巴林首都）（或译马纳马）

sentence.Network_en: They also made a presentation at the district conference in Manama, Bahrain.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们也在巴林曼纳马的地区年会中发表演说.

means.word_mean: 1. the capital of Bahrain; located at the northern end of Bahrain Island

auth_sentence.content: There was also disruption in Manama, the capital.

auth_sentence.content: The government in Manama denies any systematic abuse by police.

auth_sentence.content: Manama's Pearl Square has been the epicenter of the protests.
